messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/4981047/diff/1/doc/devel/release.html File doc/devel/release.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/4981047/diff/1/doc/devel/release.html#newcode33 doc/devel/release.html:33: is another "if". Since gofmt always puts those braces in anyway, programs will Since gofmt always puts those braces in anyway, gofmt-formatted programs will not be affected. To fix other programs, run gofmt. http://codereview.appspot.com/4981047/diff/1/doc/devel/release.html#newcode68 doc/devel/release.html:68: The old/template package is deprecated and will be removed at some s/ at some point in the future// (says 'will be' already) http://codereview.appspot.com/4981047/diff/1/doc/devel/release.html#newcode77 doc/devel/release.html:77: Uses of package container/vector in the Is this a publicly visible change? I don't think so. If not, can delete this paragraph. http://codereview.appspot.com/4981047/diff/1/doc/devel/release.html#newcode407 doc/devel/release.html:407:

Tools

s/.tool/.cmd/ to match rest of file
